issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
It is observed that ATSv2 REST endpoints are not honoring *yarn.webapp.filter-entity-list-by-user* in non-secure cluster when ACLs are enabled. 
The issue can be seen if static web app filter is not configured in  non-secure cluster.
fields.summary: ATSv2 REST APIs should honor filter-entity-list-by-user in non-secure cluster when ACls are enabled
